pull.title: Make build work on Mac OS X 10.7 Lion

events.message:
Make build work on Mac OS X 10.7 Lion
(32bit dependencies through MacPorts)

events.body:
Can I get an ACK from somebody else running 10.7 ?
What happens on 10.7 if you don't set build_arch?

Build just fails because dependencies aren't present for i386.
See makefile.osx:

> CFLAGS=-mmacosx-version-min=10.5 -**arch i386** -O3 -Wno-invalid-offsetof -Wformat $(DEBUGFLAGS) $(DEFS) $(INCLUDEPATHS)
